author: Special Correspondent
text:
The National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), an autonomous institution of UGC, awarded ‘A’ grade to Vivekanandha Institute of Information and Management Studies (VIIMS), Tiruchengode.

The peer team of the NAAC visited the college recently.

The three–member team led by Devanand, former Vice Chancellor, Central University Jammu and Kashmir, along with the member coordinator Kiran Reddy, CEO and Principal Acharaya Institute of Management and Sciences Bengaluru, and the member S. Bhilare, Head, Computer Centre – Devi Ahilya University, Indore, Madhya Pradesh evaluated the institution with seven criteria.

Based on the evaluation ‘A’ grade was awarded to VIIMS.

The Chairman M. Karunanithi congratulated the Director, department heads , teaching and non-|teaching staff members, alumni, students for achieving the NAAC ‘A’ grade for the institution.
title: NAAC award ‘A’ grade to VIIMS
